name: delivery-process
description: Suite d'outils de gestion de projet pour France TV - Pointing Poker, Delivery Board, Planification

scripts.dev: concurrently -n gateway,poker-server,poker-client,delivery-server,delivery-client,planif -c blue,green,cyan,yellow,magenta,white "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:poker:server" "npm run dev:poker:client" "npm run dev:delivery:server" "npm run dev:delivery:client" "npm run dev:planification"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd pointing-poker/server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../../delivery/server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../../planification && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:poker && npm run build:delivery
scripts.build:poker: cd pointing-poker/server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.build:delivery: cd delivery/server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build

author: France TV
